languages.text: "Как вышло, что только вам удалось вырваться из ловушки на Райкаде Минорис? Сколько правды в слухах еретика Кунрада Войгтвира, распространяемых о вас?"

traits.locale_text: "Как вышло, что только вам удалось вырваться из ловушки на Райкад Минорис? Сколько правды в слухах еретика Кунрада Войгтвира, распространяемых о вас?"

languages.text: "How is it that you were the only soul who managed to escape the trap on Rykad Minoris? How much truth is there to the rumours that the heretic Kunrad Voigtvir is spreading about you?"
languages.original_text: "Как вышло, что только вам удалось вырваться из ловушки на Райкаде Минорис? Сколько правды в слухах еретика Кунрада Войгтвира, распространяемых о вас?"

traits.locale_text: "How is it that you were the only soul who managed to escape the trap on Rykad Minoris? How much truth is there in the rumours that the heretic Kunrad Voigtvir is spreading about you?"
"How is it that you were the only soul who managed to escape the trap on Rykad Minoris? How much truth is there in the rumours that the heretic Kunrad Voigtvir is spreading about you?"
"How is it that you were the only soul who managed to escape the trap on Rykad Minoris? How much truth is there to the rumours that the heretic Kunrad Voigtvir is spreading about you?"
"How is it that you were the only soul who managed to escape the trap on Rykad Minoris? How much truth is there to the rumours that the heretic Kunrad Voigtvir is spreading about you?"
"How is it that you were the only soul who managed to escape the trap on Rykad Minoris? How much truth is there to the rumours that the heretic Kunrad Voigtvir is spreading about you?"
"How is it that you were the only soul who managed to escape the trap on Rykad Minoris? How much truth is there to the rumours that the heretic Kunrad Voigtvir is spreading about you?"

languages.text: « Comment se fait-il que vous soyez la seule personne qui soit parvenue à échapper au piège de Rykad Minoris ? Les rumeurs propagées par cet hérétique de Kunrad Voigtvir à votre sujet sont-elles vraies ? »
languages.original_text: "How is it that you were the only soul who managed to escape the trap on Rykad Minoris? How much truth is there to the rumours that the heretic Kunrad Voigtvir is spreading about you?"

traits.locale_text: « Comment se fait-il que vous soyez la seule personne qui soit parvenue à échapper au piège de Rykad Minoris ? Les rumeurs propagées par cet hérétique de Kunrad Voigtvir à votre sujet sont-elles vraies ? »

languages.text: “为什么只有你一个人逃出了小莱卡德的陷阱？异端分子昆拉德·维特威尔散布的那些关于你的谣言，其中有多少是真的？”
languages.original_text: "How is it that you were the only soul who managed to escape the trap on Rykad Minoris? How much truth is there to the rumours that the heretic Kunrad Voigtvir is spreading about you?"

traits.locale_text: “为什么只有你一个人逃出了小莱卡德的陷阱？异端分子昆拉德·维特威尔散布的那些关于你的谣言，其中有多少是真的？”

languages.text: 「ライカド・ミノリスでの罠から逃れることができた者が、あなただけだったのはなぜだ？異端者クンラッド・ボイトヴィルがあなたについて広めている噂の真偽はいかほどか？」
languages.original_text: "How is it that you were the only soul who managed to escape the trap on Rykad Minoris? How much truth is there to the rumours that the heretic Kunrad Voigtvir is spreading about you?"

traits.locale_text: 「ライカド・ミノリスでの罠から逃れることができた者が、あなただけだったのはなぜだ？異端者クンラッド・ボイトヴィルがあなたについて広めている噂の真偽はいかほどか？」

languages.text: "Wie habt Ihr es als einzige Seele geschafft, der Falle auf Rykad Minoris zu entkommen? Stimmen die Gerüchte, die der Ketzer Kunrad Voigtvir über Euch verbreitet?"
languages.original_text: "How is it that you were the only soul who managed to escape the trap on Rykad Minoris? How much truth is there to the rumours that the heretic Kunrad Voigtvir is spreading about you?"

traits.locale_text: "Wie habt Ihr es als einzige Seele geschafft, der Falle auf Rykad Minoris zu entkommen? Stimmen die Gerüchte, die der Ketzer Kunrad Voigtvir über Euch verbreitet?"

languages.text: «¿Cómo es posible que fuese usted la única persona que escapó de la trampa en Rykad Minoris? ¿Cuánto hay de cierto en los rumores que el hereje Kunrad Voigtvir divulgó sobre usted?».
languages.original_text: "How is it that you were the only soul who managed to escape the trap on Rykad Minoris? How much truth is there to the rumours that the heretic Kunrad Voigtvir is spreading about you?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Cómo es posible que fuese usted la única persona que escapó de la trampa en Rykad Minoris? ¿Cuánto hay de cierto en los rumores que el hereje Kunrad Voigtvir divulgó sobre usted?».

languages.text: "Nasıl oldu da Rykad Minoris'teki tuzaktan sadece sen kurtulmayı başardın? Kâfir Kunrad Voigtvir'in hakkında çıkardığı dedikodular doğruluk payı taşıyor mu?"
languages.original_text: "How is it that you were the only soul who managed to escape the trap on Rykad Minoris? How much truth is there to the rumours that the heretic Kunrad Voigtvir is spreading about you?"

traits.locale_text: "Nasıl oldu da Rykad Minoris'teki tuzaktan sadece sen kurtulmayı başardın? Kâfir Kunrad Voigtvir'in senin hakkında çıkardığı dedikodular doğruluk payı taşıyor mu?"
